table.name: Disclosures
table.description: A disclosures section that contains information about any arbitration awards,disciplinary events and financial matters on the firm's record.

column.name: crd_number
column.description: it is a unique identifier allocated to each broker

column.name: eventDate
column.description: describe the date of the disclosures event

column.name: disclosure Type
column.description: It provides a clear and concise way to identify the nature of the disclosure

column.name: disclosureResolution
column.description: It provides a summary of how each issue was resolved or managed

column.name: islapdExcludedCCFlag
column.description: By incorporating the islapdExcludedCCFlag column, you can manage and control your dataset more effectively

column.name: isBCExcludedCCFlag
column.description: Flags records that should be excluded from certain analyses, reports, or processes.

column.name: bcCtgryType
column.description: Assigns a category or type to each record

column.name: iaCtgryType
column.description: Facilitates data segmentation, allowing for targeted analysis and reporting.

column.name: Allegations
column.description: contains the information on what the disclosure is about

column.name: Damage Amount Requested
column.description: damage requested by a party involved in a dispute

column.name: DisplayAAOlinkIfExist
column.description: used to determine whether a link to an Additional Adjudication Outcome(AAO) or a similar document should be displayed

column.name: arbitrationClaimFieldDetail
column.description: This column helps manage the visibility of additional resource within a user interface or report.

column.name: arbitrationDocknetNumber
column.description: his column is likely used to identify or categorize arbitration-related documentation by a unique number

table.name: brokercheck_data
table.description: contains the total count of Disclosures, count of total Exams Passed and count of total State Licenses of the financial advisor targeted using CRD Number

column.name: CRD Number
column.description: CRD number of the financial advisor poining towards the CRD column from financial_advisors_db

column.name: Disclosures
column.description: Total discloures count by the financial advisor

column.name: Exams Passed
column.description: Total Exams passed by the financial advisor

column.name: State Licenses
column.description: Total State Licenses that financial advisor has.

table.name: financial_advisors_db
table.description: Information about financial financial advisors and also the main base Database table

column.name: CRD
column.description: Unique identifier for each financial advisor

column.name: NPN
column.description: NPN value

column.name: First Name
column.description: First name of the financial advisor

column.name: Middle Name
column.description: Middle name of the financial advisor

column.name: Last Name
column.description: Last name of the financial advisor

column.name: Other Names
column.description: Other names of the financial advisor

column.name: Team
column.description: Team name of the financial advisor

column.name: Broker-Dealer
column.description: Broker Dealer of the financial advisor

column.name: Broker-Dealer CRD
column.description: Broker Dealer crd number of the financial advisor

column.name: Years with Current BD
column.description: Total number of years with current Broker Dealer of the financial advisor

column.name: Current BD Start Date
column.description: Start Date of the current Broker Dealer

column.name: RIA
column.description: Registered investment financial advisor (RIA) firm name of the financial advisor

column.name: RIA CRD
column.description: crd_number of the registered investment financial advisor (RIA) firm

column.name: Years with Current RIA
column.description: number of year the financial advisor worked with the current REgistered investment financial advisor (RIA)

column.name: Current RIA State Date
column.description: advisor started working with the current registered investment financial advisor (RIA)

column.name: Address
column.description: current Address of the financial advisor

column.name: City
column.description: current City of the financial advisor

column.name: State
column.description: current address State of the financial advisor

column.name: Zip
column.description: current address Zip code of the financial advisor

column.name: Metro Area
column.description: Metro area of the financial advisor

column.name: Licenses & Exams
column.description: All the Licenses and their exams of the financial advisor

column.description: Title of the financial advisor

column.name: Designations
column.description: Designation of the financial advisor

table.name: principalExamCategory
table.description: contains Data on the principal exams taken by the financial advisor

column.name: crd_number
column.description: CRD number of the financial advisor pointing towards CRD from financial_advisors_db

column.name: examCategory
column.description: Category of exam of the financial advisor

column.name: examName
column.description: name of exam writen by the financial advisor

column.name: examTakenDate
column.description: Date on which the exam was taken by the financial advisor

column.name: examScope
column.description: Scope of the exam taken by the financial advisor

table.name: productExamCategory

column.name: examScope

table.name: registeredStates
table.description: contains Data on the registerd states of the financial advisor

column.description: CRD number of the financial advisor pointing towards CRD from financial_advisors_db

column.name: state
column.description: name of the registered state of the financial advisor

column.name: regScope
column.description: scope of the registered state of the financial advisor

column.name: status
column.description: status of the registered state of the financial advisor

column.name: reqDate
column.description: Date of Registration in this state of the financial advisor
